Texts.Chs: 把^orange;原毒锭^reset;带给带单眼镜的鲛人。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Protocite Bars^reset; to the monocled Hylotl at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我迫切需要一种罕见的本地金属，它^red;只^reset;存在于^orange;原毒世界^reset; 。我需要2个^orange;原体锭^reset;。你可以在^orange;裂变反应炉^reset;熔炼它。
Texts.Eng: There is a rare metal native ^red;only^reset; to ^orange;Proto Worlds^reset; that I am in dire need of. I need 2 ^orange;Protocite Bars^reset;. You can smelt them in a ^orange;Fission Furnace^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 没有^green;原体矿^reset;，你将无法制作某些必须的高端装备。建议你将它们储存起来！作为帮助我的谢礼，试试^green;这个^reset;！
Texts.Eng: Without ^green;protocite^reset; you won't be able to make some of the more essential high-end gear. So stay stocked! In return for that bit of help, perhaps try ^green;this thing^reset; on!
